text: Blue Money is a 1985 British criminal comedy TV movie. It stars Tim Curry, Debbe Bishop and Billy Connolly. It was made for London Weekend Television. == Story == Larry, a taxi driver, dreams of becoming a star. == Other websites == * * * Blue Money on Find Any Film * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 crime movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Television movies
title: Blue Money
